name: MAD MACHINES
detailed_description:
Mad Machines It is a physics-based ball game, inspired by bat- and close contact sports.
High pace, intense and very frustrating.

3 very different classes with unique stats and abilities are available, and team play strategies are many.

This ballgame was lovingly crafted by a sports fanatic, and with a design rooted in tennis, hockey, and baseball you’ll need to practice, practice, and practice in order to hit that heavy metal ball perfectly.



Dedicated Servers & Built for Multiplayer
All’s fair in love and brawls.

We are backing the competitive structure of Mad Machines by providing full dedicated servers; competitive integrity and even playing fields are of the utmost importance to us and our players. Currently, Mad Machines has dedicated servers in 6 regions.

Intuitive Movement & Precision
The ball’s trajectory is based on your movement and your swing, to allow for some clean and creative shots. Even though being heavy Machines, aerial movement and play is required to advance in skill level.



Machines
3 classes of Machines are available for your ball-bashing pleasure. Try out the playstyles of the Assassin-class, Support-class, and Heavy-class Machines and see which one is right for you.

Customization
You are rewarded through xp and unlock items! To take full advantage of this, you can buy the Full Version and customize all your Robots!

The Arena
Huge ramps are the key design of the arena and the surface is icy. Created to make movement feel like skateboarding feeling, yes up the walls as well, and provide space for the ball doing its heavy gliding.

Scoring with a Spikeball
Goals are protected with a shield and the only way to penetrate and score, is to hit the ball hard enough for the explosive spikes to appear. Spikes deal damage and breaks the shields!



Stamina
This is your main ressource in Mad Machines. Hit and tackle your enemies to remove their Stamina and get an advantage.
The free and combinational movement provides many ways for doing tricks and setups, but it requires stamina.

Community Driven & Constantly Upgrading
Mad Machines is an evolving sport, spurred onward by the feedback we receive directly from our community.



Here’s a little taste of what’s to come throughout our Early Access development in 2019…

May 9th
- Season ZERO Starts
- New DLC including 3 characters and unlocks
- Rewards & In-Game Standings for Community Tournaments

August 8th
- End of Season ZERO
- New Limited Grease Pack (Season 1)
- Season ZERO Ranked Rewards
- End of Ranked Season ZERO Rewards



If you would like to shape the future of Mad Machines, join our Discord server and talk with us!

The balls are in your court now.

short_description: Physics-based bat hitting ball game based on hockey, tennis and baseball played by robots. 1v1 to 3v3 online multiplayer sci-fi arena sport.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 @ 3GHz or AMD FX 8300 @3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Note: This title supports 64-bit Windows ONLY
